data.name: Starboard
data.description: Starboard is a simple plugin that can be used to define a starboard channel per-server, users can then react to messages using the star emoji to get messages showing up on in the starboard channel.
data.author: Alexis Tan <Senither#0001>

data.name: Suggestion
data.description: Suggestion is a simple plugin that adds a `!suggest` command that sends suggestions users make to a custom channel, all of this is done easily through the config.yml file that is generated by the plugin, you can seen an example of the file [here](https://github.com/avaire/suggestion-plugin/blob/master/src/main/resources/config.yml).
data.author: Alexis Tan <Senither#0001>

data.name: NowPlaying
data.description: NowPlaying is a small, single-use plugin for AvaIre that links the music handler for some servers to the bots status message, this will change the bots status when songs are being played.
data.author: Alexis Tan <Senither#0001>
